head.title: Case Management Conference
head.comment:
the eventdate, eventtime, eventloc, and eventtype fields are special
predefined constants, supplied from the case management system
ucn: the Case # division: the case's division parties: the parties, displayed as appropriate for case type
head.vardef: CourthouseMain Judicial ComplexNorth County CourthouseCriminal Justice ComplexWest County CourthouseSouth County Courthouse

form.body:
IN THE CIRCUIT COURT OF THE FIFTEENTH JUDICIAL CIRCUIT IN AND FOR PALM BEACH COUNTY, FLORIDA CASE NUMBER: ucn DIVISION: division parties
ORDER SETTING CASE MANAGEMENT CONFERENCE AND REQUIRING SUBMISSION OF CASE MANAGEMENT REPORT
Pursuant to Florida Rule of Civil Procedure 1.200(a), and Florida Rule of Judicial Administration 2.085, all parties are hereby required to attend a case management conference on eventdate at eventtime (eventlength minutes being reserved), in eventloc, Main Judicial Complex, 205 N Dixie Hwy., West Palm Beach, FloridaNorth County Courthouse, 3188 PGA Blvd., Palm Beach Gardens, FloridaCriminal Justice Complex, 3228 Gun Club Road, West Palm Beach, FloridaWest County Courthouse, 38844 State Road 80, Belle Glade, FL 33430South County Courthouse, 200 West Atlantic Ave, Delray Beach, Florida. It is further ORDERED:
A.All counsel and pro se parties must attend and must bring their appointment calendars to the conference B.All counsel and pro se parties shall be with all pertinent aspects of this case and its progress to date, and shall be prepared to discuss any action which the Court may take to: (1)schedule or reschedule the service of motions, pleadings, and other papers; (2)set or reset the time of trials, subject to rule 1.440(c) et. cetera...
